name: random-walk
title: Random Walk
description: Takes you on a random walk through the World Wide Web
author: Demon Fiddler <demonfiddler@virginmedia.com>

preferences.name: resume_session
preferences.title: Resume session
preferences.description: Resume random walk session on browser restart

preferences.name: auto_click
preferences.title: Auto-click
preferences.description: Automatically click random links at given intervals

preferences.name: interval_min
preferences.title: Minimum auto-click interval (secs)
preferences.description: The minimum interval between auto-clicks

preferences.name: interval_max
preferences.title: Maximum auto-click interval (secs)
preferences.description: The maximum interval between auto-clicks. For a fixed interval set this to the same value as Minimum interval.

preferences.name: start_url
preferences.title: Start URL
preferences.description: The starting page for a new random walk session (leave blank to start with a random search)

preferences.name: search_url
preferences.title: Search URL
preferences.description: The search page from which to start a new random walk session

preferences.name: search_term_0
preferences.title: First search term
preferences.description: The part of speech for the first random search term

preferences.name: search_term_1
preferences.title: Second search term
preferences.description: The part of speech for the second random search term

preferences.name: search_term_2
preferences.title: Third search term
preferences.description: The part of speech for the third random search term

preferences.name: search_term_3
preferences.title: Fourth search term
preferences.description: The part of speech for the fourth random search term

preferences.name: link_policy
preferences.title: Link selection policy
preferences.description: How to select which links to follow

options.label: Only follow links to other hosts
Only follow links to other domains

preferences.name: blacklist
preferences.title: Website  blacklist
preferences.description: Never follow links to sites in these domains (comma-separated, * wildcard)

preferences.name: locale
preferences.title: Locale(s)
preferences.description: A comma-separated list of lc[-CC] language/locale codes (see FAQ)

preferences.name: history_length
preferences.title: History length
preferences.description: The number of visited web page addresses to remember and avoid

preferences.name: same_host_length_limit
preferences.title: Maximum same-host sequence length
preferences.description: Backtrack from same-host link sequence if it reaches this length

preferences.name: same_domain_length_limit
preferences.title: Maximum same-domain sequence length
preferences.description: Backtrack from same-domain link sequence if it reaches this length

preferences.name: page_load_timeout
preferences.title: Maximum page load time
preferences.description: Backtrack after waiting this many seconds for an auto-clicked page to finish loading. Set to -1 to disable page load timeouts.

preferences.name: sdk.console.logLevel
preferences.title: Add-on logging level
preferences.description: Sets the levels at which the add-on emits logging messages

preferences.name: defaults
preferences.title: Restore Preference defaults
preferences.label: Restore
preferences.description: Restores all preferences to their original values

preferences.name: licenceAccepted
preferences.title: Licence Accepted
preferences.description: Indicates whether licence terms and conditions have been accepted
